Detailed Description

A metadata entry in the metadata block.

int32_t vrt::MetadataEntry::writeBytes ( vector< char > &  buf,
int32_t  off,
int32_t  len 
) const

Writes the entry to a byte buffer.

Parameters:
buf The buffer.
off Offset into the buffer.
len Length in the byte buffer.
Returns:
The number of bytes required within the byte buffer. If there are insufficient bytes to include the entire metadata block this will return a number larger than the length passed in.
